name: fritz-xml-2vcard
description: Convert FRITZ!Box address book XML format to vcards.

scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run unit-test
scripts.bundle: browserify lib/* -o dist/fritzXML2vcard-browser.js && browserify lib/browser-api.js -o dist/fritzXML2vcard-browser-api.js
scripts.minify: uglifyjs --source-map --compress -m -o dist/fritzXML2vcard-browser-min.js dist/fritzXML2vcard-browser.js && uglifyjs --source-map --compress -m -o dist/fritzXML2vcard-browser-api-min.js dist/fritzXML2vcard-browser-api.js
scripts.build: npm run versionjs && npm run escompat && npm run bundle && npm run minify && npm run cleanup

author: Rainer Rillke
